## pckgdown functions

### Build package down website

Single function to build whole site:
"This will generate a docs/ directory. The home page will be generated from your packageâ€™s README.md, and a function reference will be generated from the documentation in the man/ directory."
```{r, eval = F}
pkgdown::build_site()
```

```{r}

```


#### Build piece by piece

pkgdown::clean_site (pkg = ".")

-- Initialising site
```{r, eval = F}
pkgdown::init_site(pkg = ".")
```

Building home 
```{r, eval = F}
pkgdown::build_home(pkg = ".")
```

Building function reference
```{r, eval = F}
pkgdown::build_reference(pkg = ".")
```


Build vignettes
```{r, eval = F}
pkgdown::build_articles(pkg = ".")
```


```{r, eval = F}
pkgdown::build_news()
```
